text: @GeraldoRivera @realDonaldTrump Oh it’s become very obvious he was told by, wait for it, John Bolton in addition to another briefing. Go ahead and hold onto this one like the “coronavirus scam” Geraldo. Glad to see both your and Trumps true natures exposed for all to see. #TrumpTraitor #TrumpLiesAmericansDie
